org.maugiam.shoppingcart.wherehouse

Interface IStockeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOrder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsDiscount, FirstPercentageDiscount, ObsOrderDecorator, ObsStockDecorator, PercentageDiscount, PurchaseOrder, Wherehouse

    public interface IStockeable
    This interface represents the behavior of the classes that stocks items
    Author:
    Mauro J Giamberardino

    • Method Summary

      Returns the quantity of an specific item
      java.util.Vector<IItem> getItems()
      Return a collections of items without their quantities
      java.lang.Boolean removeItem(IItem item, java.lang.Long quantity)
